entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:14 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -22.1°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
